entry.title: Translation Award Announcement
entry.summary: After the volunteers' efforts, the translation has been partially completed, thanks to everyone's efforts. First, let's take a look at the results of recent translations.

entry.title: Being A Contributor Of Pando With Honors & Awards
entry.id: Being A Contributor Of Pando With Honors & Awards
entry.summary: Pando is an open-source project. Thank you to everyone who has contributed to the growth of Pando.

entry.title: Pando's audit report is released
entry.summary: Pando has been audited by IOActive & LeastAuthority. Click the link below to view the results.

entry.title: Write about Pando and Win Awards
entry.summary: Pando is an open-source project. In order to let more people know about pando, we will launch an essay call. Articles that meet the following conditions can participate in this activities.

entry.title: New Cryptocurrency Listed
entry.summary: USDT(erc20), BOX, MOB and XIN are listed on Pando Rings.
